function.name: read_file
function.description: Read the content of a file from the local file system. Returns file content, size, encoding, and modification time.

file_path.description: The full path to the file to read

function.name: write_file
function.description: Write content to a file. Can append to existing file or overwrite it.

file_path.description: The full path to the file to write

content.description: The content to write to the file

append.description: If true, append to existing file. If false, overwrite file. Default is false.

function.name: list_directory
function.description: List files and directories in a specified directory. Can list recursively and filter by file pattern.

dir_path.description: The directory path to list. If empty, uses current directory.

recursive.description: If true, list recursively. Default is false.

filter.description: File pattern filter (e.g. '*.cpp', '*.h'). If empty, lists all files.

function.name: search_in_files
function.description: Search for a keyword in files within a directory. Returns matching files with line numbers and content.

search_path.description: The directory path to search in. If empty, uses current directory.

file_pattern.description: File pattern filter (e.g. '*.cpp', '*.h'). If empty, searches all files.

case_sensitive.description: If true, case-sensitive search. Default is false.

recursive.description: If true, search recursively. Default is true.

function.name: create_directory
function.description: Create a directory. Creates parent directories if they don't exist.

function.name: delete_file
function.description: Delete a file from the file system.

file_path.description: The full path to the file to delete

function.name: delete_directory
function.description: Delete a directory. Can delete recursively.

recursive.description: If true, delete recursively. Default is false.

function.name: copy_file
function.description: Copy a file from source path to destination path.

dest_path.description: The destination file path or directory

function.name: move_file
function.description: Move or rename a file from source path to destination path.

dest_path.description: The destination file path or directory

function.name: get_file_info
function.description: Get detailed information about a file or directory, including size, modification time, permissions, etc.

function.name: find_files
function.description: Find files matching a pattern in a directory. Can search recursively.

search_path.description: The directory path to search in. If empty, uses current directory.

file_name_pattern.description: File name pattern (e.g. '*.cpp', 'test*.txt'). If empty, matches all files.

recursive.description: If true, search recursively. Default is true.

function.name: count_lines
function.description: Count the total lines, empty lines, and non-empty lines in a file.

file_path.description: The file path to count lines

function.name: path_exists
function.description: Check if a file or directory path exists.

function.name: join_path
function.description: Join multiple path segments into a single path.

paths.description: Array of path segments to join

function.name: normalize_path
function.description: Normalize a file path by removing redundant separators and resolving relative components.

function.name: get_file_name
function.description: Extract the file name, base name, and complete base name from a file path.

function.name: get_directory
function.description: Get the directory path from a file path.

function.name: get_file_extension
function.description: Get the file extension from a file path.

function.name: text_replace
function.description: Replace text in a string. Can replace all occurrences or just the first one.

replace_all.description: If true, replace all occurrences. If false, replace only the first. Default is true.

function.name: text_statistics
function.description: Get statistics about text content, including character count, word count, line count, paragraph count, etc.

function.name: regex_match
function.description: Match text against a regular expression pattern. Can find all matches or just the first one.

global.description: If true, find all matches. If false, find only the first match. Default is false.

function.name: text_extract
function.description: Extract text matching a regular expression pattern from a string.

pattern.description: The regular expression pattern to match

global.description: If true, extract all matches. If false, extract only the first match. Default is false.

function.name: text_encode_decode
function.description: Encode or decode text using base64 or URL encoding.

text.description: The text to encode or decode

function.name: text_format
function.description: Format text as JSON, XML, or with indentation.

format_type.description: The format type: 'json' (format JSON with indentation), 'xml' (format XML), or 'indent' (add indentation based on brackets)

function.name: get_clipboard
function.description: Get the current content from the clipboard. Returns text, HTML, URLs, and image information if available.

function.name: set_clipboard
function.description: Set content to the clipboard.

text.description: The text content to set to clipboard

format.description: The format type: 'text' or 'html'. Default is 'text'.

function.name: get_system_info
function.description: Get system information including OS type, version, CPU architecture, hostname, etc.

function.name: get_disk_space
function.description: Get disk space information for all drives or a specific drive. Returns total space, free space, used space, and usage percentage.

drive_path.description: The drive path to query. If empty, returns information for all drives.

function.name: get_environment_variable
function.description: Get an environment variable value, or all environment variables if no variable name is provided.

var_name.description: The environment variable name. If empty, returns all environment variables.

function.name: get_current_directory
function.description: Get the current working directory path.

function.name: set_current_directory
function.description: Change the current working directory to the specified path.

dir_path.description: The directory path to change to

function.name: get_time
function.description: Get the current date and time.

function.name: code_review_latest
function.description: Perform AI code review on the latest Git commit. Returns code changes, statistics, and review suggestions.

repo_path.description: The Git repository path. If empty, uses current directory.

function.name: code_review_commit
function.description: Perform AI code review on a specific Git commit by commit hash.

function.name: code_review_range
function.description: Perform AI code review on a range of Git commits between two commit hashes.

function.name: code_review_working_dir
function.description: Perform AI code review on uncommitted changes in the current working directory.

function.name: get_commit_info
function.description: Get detailed information about a Git commit, including hash, author, date, message, and branch.

commit_hash.description: The commit hash. If empty, returns information for the latest commit.

function.name: get_repo_status
function.description: Get Git repository status information, including current branch, last commit hash, uncommitted changes, total commits, and branch list.

function.name: format_datetime
function.description: Format a datetime string according to a specified format. If no datetime is provided, uses current datetime.

datetime.description: The datetime string to format (ISO format or common formats). If empty, uses current datetime.

format.description: The format string (e.g., 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'). Default is 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.

function.name: calculate_datetime
function.description: Add or subtract time from a datetime. Supports days, hours, minutes, and seconds.

datetime.description: The base datetime string. If empty, uses current datetime.

value.description: The numeric value to add or subtract

function.name: parse_datetime
function.description: Parse a datetime string and extract its components (year, month, day, hour, minute, second, etc.).

format.description: Optional format string. If not provided, tries common formats.

function.name: get_timezone
function.description: Get current system timezone information, including timezone ID, offset, and current datetime in local and UTC.

function.name: time_difference
function.description: Calculate the time difference between two datetimes. Returns difference in seconds, milliseconds, days, hours, and minutes.

datetime1.description: The first datetime string. If empty, uses current datetime.

datetime2.description: The second datetime string. If empty, uses current datetime.

function.name: calculate
function.description: Perform basic arithmetic calculations. Supports simple expressions like 'a op b' where op is +, -, *, or /.

function.name: unit_convert
function.description: Convert values between different units. Supports length (m, km, cm, mm, in, ft), weight (kg, g, lb), and temperature (C, F, K) conversions.

function.name: number_format
function.description: Format a number with various formatting options: thousands separator, currency, percent, scientific notation.

format.description: The format type: 'thousands' (add comma separator), 'currency', 'percent', 'scientific', or default

decimals.description: Number of decimal places. Default is 2.

function.name: generate_uuid
function.description: Generate a UUID (Universally Unique Identifier). Returns UUID in standard format and without braces.

function.name: generate_random_string
function.description: Generate a random string of specified length using a custom character set.

length.description: The length of the random string. Default is 16. Maximum is 1000.

charset.description: The character set to use. Default is alphanumeric (a-z, A-Z, 0-9).

function.name: hash_string
function.description: Calculate hash value of a string using specified algorithm (MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512).

algorithm.description: The hash algorithm: 'md5', 'sha1', 'sha256', or 'sha512'. Default is 'md5'.

function.name: validate_json
function.description: Validate if a string is valid JSON format. Returns validation result and error information if invalid.

function.name: validate_xml
function.description: Validate if a string is valid XML format. Returns validation result and error information if invalid.

function.name: parse_json
function.description: Parse a JSON string and return the parsed data structure. Returns the parsed object or array.

function.name: format_json
function.description: Format a JSON string with indentation for better readability.

indent.description: Number of spaces for indentation. Default is 4.

function.name: parse_csv
function.description: Parse a CSV string and convert it to JSON format. Supports custom delimiters and header rows.

delimiter.description: The CSV delimiter. Default is comma ','.

has_header.description: Whether the CSV has a header row. Default is true.

function.name: to_csv
function.description: Convert JSON data (array of objects) to CSV format. Supports custom delimiters and optional headers.

data.description: Array of objects or arrays to convert to CSV

delimiter.description: The CSV delimiter. Default is comma ','.

include_header.description: Whether to include header row. Default is true.
